00045 #ifndef UNIXEM_INCL_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK
00046 #define UNIXEM_INCL_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK
00047 
00048 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00049  * Version
00050  */
00051 
00052 #ifndef UNIXEM_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION
00053 # define UNIXEM_VER_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK_MAJOR    1
00054 # define UNIXEM_VER_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK_MINOR    5
00055 # define UNIXEM_VER_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK_REVISION 1
00056 # define UNIXEM_VER_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK_EDIT     14
00057 #endif /* !UNIXEM_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION */
00058 
00059 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00060  * Includes
00061  */
00062 
00063 #include <unixem/unixem.h>
00064 
00065 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00066  * Macros and definitions
00067  */
00068 
00069 #ifndef UNIXEM_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION
00070 # define UNIXEM_STRINGIZE_(x)       #x
00071 # define UNIXEM_STRINGIZE(x)        UNIXEM_STRINGIZE_(x)
00072 #endif /* !UNIXEM_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION */
00073 
00074 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00075  * Implicit linking
00076  */
00077 
00078 #if defined(_WIN32) || \
00079     defined(_WIN64)
00080 
00081 # if defined(__BORLANDC__) || \
00082      /* defined(__DMC__) || */ \
00083      defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) || \
00084      defined(__MWERKS__) || \
00085      defined(_MSC_VER)
00086 #  if !defined(__COMO__)
00087 #   define UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT
00088 #  endif /* compiler */
00089 # endif /* compiler */
00090 
00091 # if defined(UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT) && \
00092      defined(UNIXEM_NO_IMPLICIT_LINK)
00093 #  undef UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT
00094 # endif /* UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT && UNIXEM_NO_IMPLICIT_LINK */
00095 
00096 # if defined(UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT)
00097 
00098   /* prefix */
00099 
00100 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_PREFIX
00101 
00102   /* library basename */
00103 
00104 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_BASENAME          "unixem"
00105 
00106   /* major version */
00107 
00108 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_MAJOR_VERSION             "." UNIXEM_STRINGIZE(UNIXEM_VER_MAJOR)
00109 
00110   /* module name */
00111 
00112 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_MODULE_NAME               ""
00113 
00114   /* compiler tag */
00115 
00116 #  if defined(__BORLANDC__)
00117 #   if __BORLANDC__ == 0x0550
00118 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "bc55"
00119 #   elif (__BORLANDC__ == 0x0551)
00120 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "bc551"
00121 #   elif (__BORLANDC__ == 0x0560)
00122 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "bc56"
00123 #   elif (__BORLANDC__ == 0x0564)
00124 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "bc564"
00125 #   elif (__BORLANDC__ == 0x0582)
00126 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "bc582"
00127 #   elif (0x0590 == (__BORLANDC__ & 0xfff0))
00128 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "bc59x"
00129 #   elif (0x0610 == (__BORLANDC__ & 0xfff0))
00130 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "bc61x"
00131 #   else /* ? __BORLANDC__ */
00132 #    error Unrecognised value of __BORLANDC__
00133 #   endif /* __BORLANDC__ */
00134 
00135 /*
00136 #  elif defined(__DMC__)
00137 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME            "dm"
00138  */
00139 
00140 #  elif defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
00141 #   if (__INTEL_COMPILER == 600)
00142 #    define   UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "icl6"
00143 #   elif (__INTEL_COMPILER == 700)
00144 #    define   UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "icl7"
00145 #   elif (__INTEL_COMPILER == 800)
00146 #    define   UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "icl8"
00147 #   elif (__INTEL_COMPILER == 900)
00148 #    define   UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "icl9"
00149 #   elif (__INTEL_COMPILER == 1000)
00150 #    define   UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "icl10"
00151 #   elif (__INTEL_COMPILER == 1100)
00152 #    define   UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME         "icl11"
00153 #   else /* ? __INTEL_COMPILER */
00154 #    error Intel C/C++ version not supported
00155 #   endif /* __INTEL_COMPILER */
00156 
00157 #  elif defined(__MWERKS__)
00158 #   if ((__MWERKS__ & 0xFF00) == 0x2400)
00159 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "cw7"
00160 #   elif ((__MWERKS__ & 0xFF00) == 0x3000)
00161 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "cw8"
00162 #   elif ((__MWERKS__ & 0xFF00) == 0x3200)
00163 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "cw9"
00164 #   else /* ? __MWERKS__ */
00165 #    error CodeWarrior version not supported
00166 #   endif /* __MWERKS__ */
00167 
00168 #  elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00169 #   if _MSC_VER == 1000
00170 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc4"
00171 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1020
00172 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc42"
00173 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1100
00174 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc5"
00175 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1200
00176 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc6"
00177 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1300
00178 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc7"
00179 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1310
00180 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc71"
00181 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1400
00182 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc8"
00183 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1500
00184 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc9"
00185 #   elif _MSC_VER == 1600
00186 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME           "vc10"
00187 #   else /* ? _MSC_VER */
00188 #    error Visual C++ version not supported
00189 #   endif /* _MSC_VER */
00190 
00191 #  else /* ? compiler */
00192 #   error Unrecognised compiler
00193 #  endif /* compiler */
00194 
00195 
00196   /* operating system tag */
00197 
00198 #  if !defined(UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_OS_TAG)
00199 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_OS_TAG                   ""
00200 #  endif /* !UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_OS_TAG */
00201 
00202 
00203   /* architecture tag */
00204 
00205 #  if defined(UNIXEM_ARCH_IS_X86)
00206 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ARCH_TAG                 ""
00207 #  elif defined(UNIXEM_ARCH_IS_X64)
00208 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ARCH_TAG                 ".x64"
00209 #  elif defined(UNIXEM_ARCH_IS_IA64)
00210 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ARCH_TAG                 ".ia64"
00211 #  endif /* arch */
00212 
00213 #  if !defined(UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ARCH_TAG)
00214 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ARCH_TAG                 ""
00215 #  endif /* !UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ARCH_TAG */
00216 
00217 
00218   /* encoding tag */
00219 
00220 #  if defined(UNIXEM_CHAR_TYPE_IS_WCHAR)
00221 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ENCODING_TAG             ".widestring"
00222 #  else /* ? UNIXEM_CHAR_TYPE_IS_WCHAR */
00223 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ENCODING_TAG             ""
00224 #  endif /* UNIXEM_CHAR_TYPE_IS_WCHAR */
00225 
00226 
00227   /* threading tag */
00228 
00229 #  if defined(__MT__) || \
00230       defined(_REENTRANT) || \
00231       defined(_MT)
00232 #   if defined(_DLL) || \
00233        defined(__DLL)
00234 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_THREADING_TAG           ".dll"
00235 #   else /* ? dll */
00236 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_THREADING_TAG           ".mt"
00237 #   endif /* dll */
00238 #  else /* ? mt */
00239 #    define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_THREADING_TAG           ""
00240 #  endif /* mt */
00241 
00242 
00243   /* debug tag */
00244 
00245 #  if !defined(NDEBUG) && \
00246       defined(_DEBUG)
00247 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_DEBUG_TAG                ".debug"
00248 #  else /* ? debug */
00249 #   define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_DEBUG_TAG                ""
00250 #  endif /* debug */
00251 
00252 
00253   /* suffix */
00254 
00255 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_SUFFIX                    ".lib"
00256 
00257 
00258    /* Library name is:
00259     *
00260     * [lib]<library-basename>.<major-version>.<module-name>.<compiler-name>[.<os-arch-tag>][.<char-encoding-tag>][.<threading-tag>][.<nox-tag>][.<debug-tag>].{a|lib}
00261     */
00262 
00263 #  define UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_NAME              UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_PREFIX \
00264                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_BASENAME \
00265                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_MAJOR_VERSION \
00266                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_MODULE_NAME \
00267                                                         "." UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_COMPILER_NAME \
00268                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_OS_TAG \
00269                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ARCH_TAG \
00270                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_ENCODING_TAG \
00271                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_THREADING_TAG \
00272                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_DEBUG_TAG \
00273                                                         UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_SUFFIX
00274 
00275 
00276 #  pragma message("lib: " UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_NAME)
00277 
00278 #  pragma comment(lib, UNIXEM_IMPL_LINK_LIBRARY_NAME)
00279 
00280 # endif /* UNIXEM_IMPLICIT_LINK_SUPPORT */
00281 
00282 #endif /* Win-32 || Win-64 */
00283 
00284 /* ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// */
00285 
00286 #endif /* !UNIXEM_INCL_UNIXEM_H_IMPLICIT_LINK */
